title: Blind pick has become the home for toxic lee sin and yasuo mains/smurfs.
body:
So sadly, because of draftpick, lee and yasuo are always banned, and since these 2 champions are the most popular champions in league of legends (Lee sin especially) I think riot employees should go on a low gold/silver account and check out some of these players and see what their tribunal system is doing wrong.

Also, when are we gonna have one game with a lee sin/yasuo not in a blind pick game? :)

replies.body: Or maybe just normal Yasuo and Lee sins with some of those players being ragers that's giving you the impression all Yasuo and Lee Sin players are 2 IQ shitlords
that promised game probably wont come until lee/yas get their power shifts or the meta changes, heres looking to season 8
